item.title: The C-Cex Crypto Exchange Has Introduced Ethereum Markets
item.description:
The C-Cex Crypto Exchange Has Introduced Ethereum Markets

The crypto currency exchange C-Cex has introduced Ethereum (ETH) trading markets that include over 100 crypto currencies. Prior to launching the ETH markets there were BTC, USD, LTC and DOGE markets available and now you can trade many coins directly for Ether coins.

item.title: The Gatecoin Crypto Exchange Has Been Hacked
item.description:
The Gatecoin Crypto Exchange Has Been Hacked

The Hong Kong based crypto currency exchange Gatecoin has been hacked and had apparently lost a lot of Ethereum and some Bitcoins stollen by the hackers. The official announcement released by the exchange says that the breach of their system caused a los of 15% of their crypto-asset deposits.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - A quiet week comes to an end
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - A quiet week comes to an end

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candle analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.

item.title: Why most bitcoin mining farms are hidden or not publicly shown?
item.description:
Why most bitcoin mining farms are hidden or not publicly shown?

Answer (1 of 3): From my experience, most legitimate cloud mining operations would be more than happy to share photos of their "mines". Cloud mining and bitcoin mining are some of the most googled phrases around Bitcoin. This is due to the hype around them. It is getting more difficult to trust ...

item.title: I want to instantly buy bitcoin in the next 10 minutes, where is the best place to do that on the internet?
item.description:
I want to instantly buy bitcoin in the next 10 minutes, where is the best place to do that on the internet?

Answer (1 of 4): Probably the website Bitcoin Ranger. It has developed a solid reputation for being the "convenience store of bitcoin". It's also one of the few places where you can buy bitcoin with Paypal. Because buying bitcoins with Paypal or credit card should be easy! ~~

item.title: What sort of math problems are involved in mining bitcoin?
item.description:
What sort of math problems are involved in mining bitcoin?

Answer (1 of 3): Bitcoin mining is guessing, over and over, a value that gets added to the header of the block you are trying to mine. Each time, once you fill in your guess, the header is put through the SHA-256 hash function twice.

item.title: Can java be used for high frequency trading?
item.description:
Can java be used for high frequency trading?

Answer: In US liquid markets, "high frequency trading" strategies are usually implemented in C/C++, if not at FPGAs / RDMA adapters, which would shut a Java-based HFT implementation out of the market. However, your strategy is effectively "high frequency" if your code is faster than mostly every...
